guest.name: Gaurav Misra
guest.title: Co-founder & CEO
guest.background: Gaurav Misra is the co-founder and CEO of Captions, a leading AI-powered video creation tool. Previously, he was an early employee at Snap, where he led the Design Engineering team and played a pivotal role in product innovation.
guest.background_zh: Gaurav Misra 是 AI 视频创作工具 Captions 的联合创始人兼 CEO。在此之前，他是 Snap 的早期核心成员，领导设计工程团队（Design Engineering），在产品创新方面发挥了关键作用。

episodeSummary: Gaurav Misra shares the radical product philosophies behind Captions' rapid growth and his time at Snap. He discusses the 'marketable feature per week' engineering goal, the necessity of a 'secret roadmap' for true innovation, and how to leverage technical debt strategically.
episodeSummary_zh: Gaurav Misra 分享了推动 Captions 快速增长的激进产品哲学以及他在 Snap 的从业经验。他探讨了“每周发布一个可营销功能”的工程目标、通过“秘密路线图”实现真正创新的必要性，以及如何战略性地利用技术债务来换取速度。
